GTA5.name: Invincibility
GTA5.description: Activate to become invulnerable to all damage for 5 minutes.
GTA5.code: RIGHT, X, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, R1, RIGHT, LEFT, X, TRIANGLE

GTA5.name: Max Health and Armor
GTA5.description: Instantly restores your health and armor to maximum levels.
GTA5.code: CIRCLE, L1, TRIANGLE, R2, X, SQUARE, CIRCLE, RIGHT, SQUARE, L1, L1, L1

GTA5.name: Super Jump
GTA5.code: LEFT, LEFT, TRIANGLE, TRIANGLE, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, SQUARE, R1, R2

GTA5.name: Moon Gravity
GTA5.code: LEFT, LEFT, L1, R1, L1, RIGHT, LEFT, L1, LEFT

GTA5.name: Raise Wanted Level
GTA5.description: Increase your wanted level by one star.
GTA5.code: R1, R1, CIRCLE, R2, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT

GTA5.name: Lower Wanted Level
GTA5.description: Decrease your wanted level by one star.
GTA5.code: R1, R1, CIRCLE, R2, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT, RIGHT, LEFT

GTA5.name: Fast Run
GTA5.code: TRIANGLE, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, L2, L1, SQUARE

GTA5.name: Fast Swim
GTA5.code: LEFT, LEFT, L1, RIGHT, RIGHT, R2, LEFT, L2, RIGHT

GTA5.name: Recharge Ability
GTA5.description: Instantly refill your special ability meter.
GTA5.code: X, X, SQUARE, R1, L1, X, RIGHT, LEFT, X

GTA5.name: Give Parachute
GTA5.description: Get a parachute if you don't have one.
GTA5.code: LEFT, RIGHT, L1, L2, R1, R2, R2, LEFT, LEFT, RIGHT, L1

GTA5.name: Skyfall
GTA5.description: Spawn mid-air and freefall to the ground.

GTA5.description: Make your bullets set things on fire.
